desc.en: A fast, practical overview: what mutations are, why they happen, soft mutation in real sentences, possessives, AM/NM, numbers, and the biggest traps.
desc.cy: Trosolwg cyflym a defnyddiol: beth yw treigladau, pam maen nhw’n digwydd, treiglad meddal mewn brawddegau, meddiannau, TL/TT, rhifau, a’r trapiau mwyaf.
